incidents.name: [Global][Domain] - Domains Name incident notification on IN tld

incident_updates.body: An incident is in progress on our Domain Names offer, customers in the impacted zone may face some difficulties. Please find the details: Start time : 30/01/2025 15:00 UTC Service impact : Customer with a .in domains name are unable to perform some tasks. Ongoing actions : Our teams are working to resolve the issue. We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Exchange offer. Start time : 30/01/2025 21:00 UTC End time : 30/01/2025 22:30 UTC Service impact : Customers will be unable to access their mails for a maximum duration of 10 minutes during the operation. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Hosted Exchange offer, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment. Thank you for your understanding.

Start time : 30/01/2025 21:00 UTC End time : 30/01/2025 23:00 UTC Service impact : There be a downtime of 30 min during the migration on Filerz246. Service improvement : The goal of this maintenance is to improve the performance and enhance the security of our infrastructure. Thank you for your understanding.

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting Offer. Start time : 03/02/2025 22:00 UTC End time : 04/02/2025 05:00 UTC Service impact : Filerz following will be unavailable one by one during 20 minutes. Cluster028- Filerz1582 Cluster030 - Filerz1509 Cluster031 - Filerz1671 Cluster030 - Filerz1565 Cluster029 - Filerz1550 Cluster029 - Filerz1515 Service improvement : We are going to reboot the Filerz one by one (Web Hosting server) to improve the performance and stability of the service. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting Offer. Start time : 13/02/2025 21:00 UTC End time : 14/02/2025 00:00 UTC Service impact : Suspension of trafic from AI & content indexing bots & crawlers on all impacted clusters. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our products and services, we will carry out this maintenance in our Graveline Datacenters. Thank you for your understanding.
Update : 2.3% of all clusters are now upgraded. Our technical team will continue the upgrade on 02/03/2025.

Update : 100 more containers have been upgraded. We will begin to increase the number of containers being upgraded on a daily basis. Please note that upgrades will continue to be conducted from Monday to Thursday.
Update : The first 100 containers have been upgraded.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Database offer. Start time : 27/01/2025 08:00 UTC End time : 27/02/2025 21:00 UTC Service impact : 1 minute downtime per customer. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing an upgrade on MySQL 8.0 Thank you for your understanding.
